title: Memoriae sacrum Lanceloti Davves S:T:D: Collegii Reginæ apud Oxonienses olim Socii, & Bartonianæ post ecclesiæ (ubi & Christo primùm nomen dederat) in agro Westmorlandiæ per annos 48 pastoris, Carleolensis præbendarii, toū panu, qui anno partæ per Christum salutis 1654, Ætatis Suæ 77, mense Martio, præsenti seculo malo (spe multo melioris) valedixit.
author: T. T. aut
notes: Consists of three poems, the first in Greek (signed: T.T.), the second in Latin (signed: Jos. Williamson A.B.C.R.), and the third in English (Signed: C. Ellys A.B. C.R.).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
